00025 BOOLEAN EnterBobbyRUsed()
00026 {
00027   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00028 
00029        //gfBigImageMouseRegionCreated = FALSE;
00030 
00031       // load the background graphic and add it
00032       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00033       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\usedbackground.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00034       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiUsedBackground));
00035 
00036       // load the gunsgrid graphic and add it
00037       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00038       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\usedgrid.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00039       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiUsedGrid));
00040 
00041       InitBobbyBrTitle();
00042 
00043       guiPrevUsedFilterMode = -1;
00044       guiCurrentUsedFilterMode = -1;
00045 
00046       SetFirstLastPagesForUsed(guiCurrentUsedFilterMode);
00047 
00048       //Draw menu bar
00049       InitBobbyMenuBar( );
00050       InitBobbyRUsedFilterBar();
00051 
00052       RenderBobbyRUsed( );
00053 
00054       return(TRUE);
00055 }
